mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, category_code, si_id, price, integral, discounts, logo_key, invetory, sales, unit, status, create_time, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logoKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invetory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
